title: Add Place Order, Add to Cart, Wishlist, Customer Address, UPI Payment & Business Details

requirements.summary: Add Place Order, Add to Cart, and Wishlist buttons to each product card below the price, styled with the warm terracotta/sand theme
acceptanceCriteria: Each product card displays a 'Place Order' button directly below the price
Each product card displays an 'Add to Cart' button below the price
Each product card displays a Wishlist heart icon button
All three elements are consistently styled with the site's warm color theme

file_operations.description: Replace the WhatsApp-only order button with three action elements below the price: a 'Place Order' button, an 'Add to Cart' button, and a Wishlist heart icon button. Style all three consistently with the warm terracotta theme using the existing color variables (--color-primary, --color-accent). Wire the 'Add to Cart' button to call an addToCart handler that will be passed as a prop. Wire the heart icon to call an addToWishlist handler. Wire 'Place Order' to call an openCheckout handler. All handlers will be provided by the parent component via props.

Add React state for cart (array of items with product, quantity) and wishlist (array of products). Create handlers: addToCart(product), addToWishlist(product), toggleWishlist(productId), openCheckout(product). Pass these handlers and the wishlist state to the Services component as props so product cards can use them. Initialize state at the top of the App component using useState.

requirements.summary: Add a Cart slide-out drawer displaying added items with name, price, quantity controls, and subtotal
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking 'Add to Cart' on a product adds it to the cart area
Cart area shows product name, price, and quantity
Cart area shows a subtotal
Cart can be opened/closed by the user
Items can be removed from the cart

file_operations.description: Create a Cart component that renders as a slide-out drawer from the right side of the screen. Accept props: isOpen (boolean), onClose (function), items (array of cart items with product object and quantity), onUpdateQuantity (function to change item quantity), onRemoveItem (function to remove an item), and onCheckout (function to proceed to checkout). Display each item with product name, price, quantity controls (- and + buttons), and a remove button. Show a subtotal at the bottom calculated from all items. Include a 'Proceed to Checkout' button that calls onCheckout. Style with the warm theme colors. Use a fixed overlay and transform transition for the slide-out effect.

Add state for cart visibility (isCartOpen). Add handlers: openCart, closeCart, updateCartQuantity(productId, newQuantity), removeFromCart(productId), and proceedToCheckout. Wire the Cart component into the layout with these handlers. Add a cart icon button to the Navigation component (pass openCart and cart item count as props). Ensure cart state updates trigger re-renders of both Cart and Navigation components.

Add a cart icon button to the navigation bar (desktop and mobile) that displays the number of items in the cart as a badge. Accept cartItemCount and onCartClick as props. Position the cart icon to the right of existing CTA button on desktop and in the mobile menu. Style the badge with a small circle using the accent color.

requirements.summary: Add a Wishlist slide-out panel displaying saved items with name and price, with heart icon toggle on product cards
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the heart icon on a product adds it to the Wishlist area
Wishlist area displays saved products with name and price
Heart icon toggles filled/unfilled to reflect wishlist status
Items can be removed from the wishlist

file_operations.description: Create a Wishlist component that renders as a slide-out panel from the right side (or top on mobile). Accept props: isOpen (boolean), onClose (function), items (array of wishlist product objects), and onRemoveItem (function). Display each wishlist item with product name, price, and a remove button. Include an empty state message when no items are saved. Style consistently with the Cart drawer using warm theme colors and a similar slide-out transition.

Add state for wishlist visibility (isWishlistOpen). Add handlers: openWishlist, closeWishlist, removeFromWishlist(productId). Wire the Wishlist component into the layout with these handlers. Add a wishlist icon button to the Navigation component (pass openWishlist and wishlist item count as props). Update the toggleWishlist handler to check if the product is already in the wishlist and add or remove accordingly.

Add a wishlist heart icon button to the navigation bar (desktop and mobile) that displays the number of saved items as a badge. Accept wishlistItemCount and onWishlistClick as props. Position the wishlist icon between the existing CTA and cart icon. Style the badge similarly to the cart badge.

Update the heart icon button to reflect wishlist status: render a filled heart if the product is in the wishlist array, unfilled otherwise. Accept the wishlist array as a prop and check product.id against it. Use conditional rendering or CSS classes to toggle the heart appearance.

requirements.summary: Add a Customer Address form in the checkout flow triggered by 'Place Order', collecting name, address, city, PIN code, and phone number
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking 'Place Order' opens a modal or section with an address form
Form fields include: full name, street address, city/town, PIN code, and phone number
All fields are validated before submission
Form is styled consistently with the site theme

file_operations.description: Create a CheckoutModal component that renders a modal overlay containing a multi-step checkout flow. Accept props: isOpen (boolean), onClose (function), orderItem (product object or cart items array), and onOrderComplete (function). The first step displays a customer address form with fields: fullName, streetAddress, city, pinCode, phoneNumber. Validate all fields (required, phoneNumber format, pinCode numeric). Style the modal with the warm theme colors and include a 'Continue to Payment' button that advances to the payment step when the form is valid. Store form data in local component state.

Add state for checkout modal visibility (isCheckoutOpen) and current order item (checkoutItem). Update openCheckout handler to set checkoutItem (either a single product from 'Place Order' or all cart items from 'Proceed to Checkout') and open the modal. Update proceedToCheckout to pass cart items to openCheckout. Wire the CheckoutModal component into the layout with isCheckoutOpen, closeCheckout handler, checkoutItem, and an onOrderComplete handler that will be defined later.

requirements.summary: Display UPI-only payment option with UPI ID or QR code placeholder in the checkout flow
acceptanceCriteria: Payment section shows only UPI as the payment method
No card or cash-on-delivery options are present
UPI section includes a label and a placeholder UPI ID or QR code area
Payment section is shown after the address form in the order flow

file_operations.description: Add a second step to the CheckoutModal for payment after the address form is submitted. Display a UPI payment section with a heading 'Payment Method: UPI Only', a placeholder UPI ID (e.g., 'arpan@upi'), and a QR code placeholder (a square div or image placeholder styled with the theme). Use the qr-code component to render a QR code encoding the UPI ID for payment (verify the component's usage instructions before implementing). Include an order summary showing the product(s), total amount, and delivery address. Add a 'Confirm Order' button that calls onOrderComplete and closes the modal. Do not include any other payment methods.

requirements.summary: Update business details: About text to 'It Is My Dream Business', location to 'Diamond Harbour, Falta', contact to '+91 86173 76874', and service tagline to 'Glow Your Beautiful Moments'
acceptanceCriteria: About section includes the text 'It Is My Dream Business'
Location 'Diamond Harbour, Falta' is displayed in the footer and/or contact section
Contact phone number shows '+91 86173 76874' in footer and contact section
Service tagline 'Glow Your Beautiful Moments' appears in the hero, services section, or footer

file_operations.description: Replace the existing About section narrative copy with 'It Is My Dream Business'. Keep the three animated stat cards unchanged. Ensure the new text is styled consistently with the existing warm theme.

Update the hero slogan or description to include the tagline 'Glow Your Beautiful Moments'. Replace or append this tagline to the existing hero copy, ensuring it is prominently displayed and styled with the warm theme.

Update the footer contact details to display the location 'Diamond Harbour, Falta' and the phone number '+91 86173 76874'. Replace the existing location and phone number in the footer contact section with these new values. Ensure the formatting and styling remain consistent with the existing footer design.

Update the Contact section to display the phone number '+91 86173 76874' and the location 'Diamond Harbour, Falta'. Replace the existing contact details with these new values. Update the WhatsApp button link to use the new phone number. Ensure all changes are styled consistently with the existing warm theme.

Add or update a section heading or description in the Products/Services section to include the tagline 'Glow Your Beautiful Moments'. This can be a subheading or introductory text above the product grid. Style it with the warm theme colors.
